bukkit.Vandolis
Class EconEntity

java.lang.Object
  bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Shop, User
public abstract class EconEntity
extends java.lang.Object

Base entity for the economy. Shops and User extend this.

Author:
Vandolis

Method Detail

addShopItems

public void addShopItems(ShopItemStack stack)
Used if the entity is not a Player. Adds the ShopItemStack to the availableItems array.

Parameters:

addTransaction

public void addTransaction(Transaction trans)
Adds the given Transaction to the entities array of transactions. Increases the correct numTransBuy/Sell based on which the entity is.

Parameters:
trans -

autoDesposit

public void autoDesposit(long serverTime)
Used to add money to the entity on a given interval. Send it the current server time.

checkMaxBuy

private void checkMaxBuy(ShopItemStack stack)
                  throws EconException
Checks to see if the entity can buy the given amount of items based on the ShopItem maxBuy. Throws an EconException if they can't buy that many.

private void removeTimeouts()
Goes through the list of Transaction and removes any that have timed out.

getAvailItems

public java.util.ArrayList<ShopItemStack> getAvailItems()
Returns an ArrayList containing the entities ShopItemStack. If the entity is a User then it will automatically update the array before returning it.

@Deprecated
public boolean hasItems(ShopItemStack stack)
Deprecated. 

Checks to see if the entity has enough of the item given in the ShopItemStack. False if there is no matching item, or if there are not enough.

undoTransaction

public void undoTransaction(Transaction trans)
Removes the last Transaction from the transaction list. Called when the last transaction is undone. Also removes from the correct numTransBuy/Sell.
